FOUND IN: Evaluate or assess the value, nature, or quality of something.
Digress (verb: to turn aside from the main topic in speech or writing)
Vagabond (a person with no permanent home, often wandering aimlessly)
Assassination (a targeted killing of a prominent figure for political reasons)
Covens (as a term specifically associated with groups of witches)
